013    package net.sf.oval.internal.util;
014    
015    import java.lang.ref.SoftReference;
016    import java.util.HashMap;
017    import java.util.LinkedList;
018    import java.util.Map;
019    
020    /**
021     * @author Sebastian Thomschke
022     */
023    public class ObjectCache<K, V>
024    {
025            private final Map<K, SoftReference<V>> map = new HashMap<K, SoftReference<V>>();
026    
027            private final LinkedList<V> objectsLastAccessed = new LinkedList<V>();
028            private final int objectsToKeepCount;
029    
030            /**
031             * Creates a new cache keeping all objects.
032             */
033            public ObjectCache()
034            {
035                    objectsToKeepCount = -1;
036            }
037    
038            /**
039             * @param maxObjectsToKeep the number of cached objects that should stay in memory when GC 
040             * starts removing SoftReferences to free memory 
041             */
042            public ObjectCache(final int maxObjectsToKeep)
043            {
044                    this.objectsToKeepCount = maxObjectsToKeep;
045            }
046    
047            public void compact()
048            {
049                    for (final Map.Entry<K, SoftReference<V>> entry : map.entrySet())
050                    {
051                            final SoftReference<V> ref = entry.getValue();
052                            if (ref.get() == null)
053                            {
054                                    map.remove(entry.getKey());
055                            }
056                    }
057            }
058    
059            public boolean contains(final K key)
060            {
061                    return map.containsKey(key);
062            }
063    
064            public V get(final K key)
065            {
066                    final SoftReference<V> softReference = map.get(key);
067                    if (softReference != null)
068                    {
069                            final V value = softReference.get();
070    
071                            if (value == null)
072                            {
073                                    map.remove(key);
074                            }
075                            else if (objectsToKeepCount > 0 && value != objectsLastAccessed.getFirst())
076                            {
077                                    objectsLastAccessed.remove(value);
078                                    objectsLastAccessed.addFirst(value);
079                                    if (objectsLastAccessed.size() > objectsToKeepCount)
080                                    {
081                                            objectsLastAccessed.removeLast();
082                                    }
083                            }
084                            return softReference.get();
085                    }
086                    return null;
087            }
088    
089            public void put(final K key, final V value)
090            {
091                    map.remove(key);
092                    map.put(key, new SoftReference<V>(value));
093            }
094    }
